PAD_MausoleumEntry.synopsis: On approaching the Thorm Mausoleum in SCL, characters comment on the sigils placed around the entrance of the Mausoleum. Halsin, Minthara, Shadowheart, Druids and Selune followers have more context on what they are seeing.

PAD_MausoleumEntry_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MausoleumEntry_0.text: These sigils... what were they for?
